title: [iOS + Android] App development: Music tinderlike networking app
desc: -------------------------------------------------App description-------------------------------------------------[url removed, login to view] is a networking app for musicians. Think tinder but for networking purposes. Musicians select their skills, the skills they are looking for and their location. Musicians then upload 10s audio clips that showcase their skills. They are presented with a daily batch of 20 musicians who match their criteria. Instead of swiping pictures, musicians will swipe audio tracks.We have the design already done and uploaded to Zeplin.-------------------------------------------------App key functionalities:-------------------------------------------------1. Algorithm generate daily batches of "matches" based on users criteria2. Audio upload (mp3, wav) + crop + name/tag > storage3. Smooth streaming of 10s audio clips4. Auto-detection of zipcodes > tell user if app has launched in their locale5. Key messaging functionalities6. Alerts/notificationsBONUS: if we can integrate with soundcloud, youtube and spotify to allow user to pick their track, upload them and crop 10s ... that would be ideal. But not sure it is feasible?-------------------------------------------------Deliverables:-------------------------------------------------iOs appAndroid appBasic documentation written for app admin (enable new zipcodes, access email list, batch size, etc.)-------------------------------------------------Constraints:-------------------------------------------------Firebase free account for backend of android app (not sure about iOs)Audio should be compressed for minimal space usage-------------------------------------------------Project scope:-------------------------------------------------Build prototype on both iOs and AndroidIterate based on user feedback (2 weeks testing period)-------------------------------------------------List of screens - sign-up flow:-------------------------------------------------What is your name? Profile picture?How would you rather meet? [In-person only, remote only, both]If in-person, what is your location? [zipcode]If zipcode not launched, what is your email? [email]What are your skills? [select 3 skills]For each skills, level and examples? [5 stars rating, up to 3 audio clip per skill - max 10s]What skills are you looking for? [select 3 skills]What are your favorite genres? [select 3 genres]What are your goals? [select 3 goals: create band, collaborate, network, etc.]What are your favorite channels + link social media> Get started-------------------------------------------------List of screens once signed-up:-------------------------------------------------Splash screenSign-in / Sign-upTutorial screens x3Main menuProfile view - when swiping (yes/no)Profile view - my profileMy matches - list of profilesMy favorites - list of profilesMessages - list viewMessages - conversation viewFiltersSettingsForgot password - popupDelete account - popupShare this app - popup

title: Implement Proxy Certificate on Android 7
desc: We currently use a product from IBM to force all traffic on corporate mobile devices through an on premise proxy server. Since update in Android that no longer honours user installed certificates the devices can no longer connect to secure services.We are looking for a method or app that will allow us top intercept and filter secure traffic on Android 7 and later [url removed, login to view] a way to install the proxy certificate as root without rooting the android device.Ideally still using the maas360 MDM platform. We currently have a maas360 vpn policy that routes all traffic from he devices back to a windows virtual machine. but still have no was of intercepting secure traffic.Bidder will- need to have access to an android 7+ test device- be given access and quick training on the maas360 MDM platform- access to the Virtual machine hosting the maas360 VPN

desc: Can a game developer help me create a gaming platform online where people can login and gamble with real funds on a monopoly-like site that runs on a short time interval and real money can be made irrespective of a gamers location. The determinant will be two dices that will be tossed in turns until time elapses and the winner emerges. At the beginning of the game, the player selects how much he /she is willing to stake. When a winner emerges, the funds are transferred to the winners account instantly. I will post further details once i find that anyone is interested.
